title: In-Game Chat is JACKED!  Need help/suggestion
body:
When I'm in game.. when I press 'enter' to open chat and then type..  all characters appear as solid squares, no letters or numbers or symbols, just all squares. I cant chat in game, no one responds, so I have no idea if team mates see my 'chat'. It is very frustrating. 
Anyone seen this before? My chat in post game stats works just fine. Only happens in game.

replies.body: That's really strange, I've never heard of this issue before. Do you happen to be using a language pack outside of US - NA in your operating system? That could definitely be the cause if so.

No, I don't believe so. I've only been playing about 4 months. I downloaded the game from Riot, followed all the prompts and started playing. I have no mods or 3rd party software. It just started happening for no apparent reason that I can see.
I have done the modify the input.ini file fix... didn't work.  I even deleted the file... didn't work.
OK... so uninstall then reinstall and chat now working as it should........  Last resort was best resort....
